rationale: Endemic to Lake Malawi and Lake Malombe with a wide distribution. A population decline is reported due to heavy fishing in the southern arms of Lake Malawi and in Lake Malombe but the decline is currently not thought to exceed 30% in the last 10 years.
assessor: Kazembe, J., Makocho, P. & Mailosi, A.
evaluator: Snoeks, J. (Freshwater Fish Red List Authority) & Darwall, W. (Freshwater Biodiversity Assessment Programme)
